about_the_game:
SurvivalWorld is an open world survival game in which you can take different paths, dedicate yourself to surviving facing creatures and ecosystem challenges, or you can dedicate yourself to building what you want without limiting yourself.

Features:

Survival

Make your way through different biomes, different resources that you will have to use to survive, hunt, defend yourself from creatures and protect yourself from the cold and heat that could kill you.

Build

The best way to protect yourself is by building, as someone important said the only limit is the imagination, using different blocks you can build whatever you want, houses, castles, towers, walls, among many other things.

Environment

The world is full of different life forms, animals that you can domesticate, you can even ride some of them. In addition to different plants that you can grow and lead a quiet life as a farmer.

Discover

Exploration, the world is a large island that has different biomes, caves that have special resources and minerals, as well as creatures. In each biome you can find creatures of all kinds, from large spiders to golems, desert creatures, flying insects, and a simple, cute sheep.

Research

What does it consist of? Basically as you play, obtaining resources you will need a research table, this will allow you to study the different resources that you have obtained, by doing so it will give you points, these will be useful to learn recipes, such as blocks, workstations, tools and so on.

Days and Nights

Keep in mind that the days in SurvivalWorld are usually long, but at the same time, the nights are also long, and you don't want to have to face enemies at night, so you would need a comfortable bed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It can run in both low quality and high quality without problems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Start your adventure in a new world, inhabited by different creatures, fight to survive, build what you want, tame creatures, exploring caves or biome and experience their challenges
